
#**Plots**

Load Libraries

```
library(ggplot2)
library(gapminder)
library(dplyr)
```


####**1) Plot 1**
```
ggplot(data = gapminder, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, by = continent)) + 
  geom_point(aes(color = continent, shape = continent, size = continent)) +
  scale_shape_manual(values = c(19, 17, 15, 3, 7)) +
  scale_size_manual(values = c(3, 3, 3, 3, 3, 3)) +
  theme(text = element_text(size = 15))
```
  
####**2) Plot 2**
```
ggplot(data = gapminder, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, by = continent)) + 
  geom_point(aes(color = continent, shape = continent, size = continent)) +
  scale_shape_manual(values = c(19, 17, 15, 3, 7)) +
  scale_size_manual(values = c(3 ,3, 3, 3, 3, 3)) +
  theme(text = element_text(size = 15)) +
  scale_x_log10()
```  
  
####**3) Plot 3**
```
ggplot(data = gapminder, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, by = continent)) + 
  geom_point(aes(color = continent, shape = continent, size = continent)) +
  scale_shape_manual(values = c(19, 17, 15, 3, 7)) +
  scale_size_manual(values = c(3, 3, 3, 3, 3, 3)) +
  theme(text = element_text(size = 18)) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  geom_smooth(method = lm, aes(group = 1))
``` 
  
####**4) Plot 4** 
```
ggplot(data = gapminder, aes(x = lifeExp, fill = continent)) +
      geom_density(kernel = 'gaussian', aes(), alpha = .3, size = .75) +
      theme(text = element_text(size = 15)) +
      facet_wrap(~ year)
```

####**5) Plot 5**
```
ggplot(data = gapminder, aes(x = continent, y = lifeExp)) +
      geom_boxplot(aes(color = continent)) +
      theme(text = element_text(size = 15), axis.text.x = element_text(angle = -90)) +
      facet_wrap(~ year)
```      
####**6) Plot 6**
```
ggplot(data = gapminder, aes(x = lifeExp, fill = continent)) +
      geom_density(kernel = 'gaussian', aes(), alpha = .3, size = .75) +
      theme(text = element_text(size = 15)) 
```

####**7) Plot 7**
```
str(gapminder)
```

```
filter(gapminder, continent == 'Asia') %>%
ggplot(aes(x = lifeExp, fill = continent)) +
      geom_density(kernel = 'gaussian', aes(), alpha = .3, size = .75) +
      scale_fill_manual(values = c('green')) +
      geom_vline(aes(xintercept = mean(lifeExp))) +
      theme(text = element_text(size = 15))
```     
    
####**8) Plot 8**

First I made a new data frame with only continent and mean life expectancy

```
mean_life <- data.frame(group_by(gapminder, continent) %>%  
    summarise(mean = mean(lifeExp)))
```
Then I plotted it.

```
ggplot(data = gapminder, aes(x = lifeExp, fill = continent)) +              
      geom_density(kernel = 'gaussian', aes(), alpha = .3, size = .75) +
      theme(text = element_text(size = 15)) +
      geom_vline(data = mean_life, aes(xintercept = mean)) +
      facet_wrap(~ continent) 
```      
      
      
      
#**Find the mistakes**

load modified gapinder dataset

```
library(ggplot2)

hw_gapminder <- read.csv('C:/Users/Rosen_000/Downloads/hw_gapminder.csv')

str(hw_gapminder)
```

####**1) Given:**

```
mean_lifeExp <- mean(hw_gapminder$lifeExpe)
```

####**Fixed:**
    
```
mean_lifeExp <- mean(hw_gapminder$lifeExp) 
```

####**2) Given:**

```
small_set <- hw_gapminder[c(1, 2, 3, 4, 1300:1304), ('country', 'continent', 'year')]
```

####**Fixed:**
```
small_set <- hw_gapminder[c(1, 2, 3, 4, 1300:1304), c('country', 'continent', 'year')] 
```

####**3) Given:** 
```
mean_gdp <- mean(hw_gapminder$gdpPercap)
```
####**Fixed:**
```    
mean_gdp <- mean(hw_gapminder$gdpPercap, na.rm = TRUE)
```
####**Given:**
```
max_country <- hw_gapminder$country[which(hw_gapminder$lifeExp = max(hw_gapminder$lifeExp))]
```

####**Fixed:**
```
max_country <- hw_gapminder$country[which(hw_gapminder$lifeExp == max(hw_gapminder$lifeExp))] 
```
